Disaster Response Coordination Platform

Real-time updates, official alerts, and resource coordination to assist in emergencies.

What This Platform Offers

We help communities stay informed and safe during natural disasters by enabling authorities, witnesses, and responders to share vital data quickly.

üìç Disaster Tracking

Track disasters, view affected areas, and get real-time updates from official sources.

üìù Reports & Verification

Submit reports with images or descriptions. Gemini AI verifies disaster content automatically.

üöë Resources & Relief

Discover and share available emergency resources near disaster zones using geolocation.
